TopicTitle: RecoverAsset - Rescue Kerbal from surface of Mun

Articles.Content:
Hey folks,

I guess I've encountered a bug. I accepted the contract: Rescue Ronsey Kerbal from the surface of the Mun. I landet next to the capsule but it's empty, no Kerbal in sight (and yes, I did switch to it). I did see him tho some time ago displayed as an icon on the mun during another mission. There are currently 0 EVAs registered at the tracking station... just the lander. What should I do? Is there any way I can find the Kerbal?
Hi RaHor81, can you upload the save to dropbox or a similar site please, we can see if we can find him

there you go mate:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/h5kvjdibw7suh4g/quicksave%20%2357.sfs?dl=0

thx in advance for your help

He was very still, yes, sleeping, just sleeping,

KERBAL

{

name = Ronsey Kerman

gender = Male

type = Unowned

brave = 0.1805271

dumb = 0.6349507

badS = False

tour = False

state = Dead

ToD = 7200

idx = -1

CAREER_LOG

{

flight = 1

0 = Die

}

FLIGHT_LOG

{

flight = 1

}

}

But he's better now.
well... I got Ronsey Kerman, but my tech tree is gone now... When I open the research center no tech nodes are displayed... un- and reinstalling the game brought no change...
Tech Tree was gone, Rocket editor messed up, probably conflicting versions... I'm running latest vanilla KSP. Anyways, thanks a lot mate, I'm back on track now! Cheers

Oh pants that would be my fault, I have Claws fixes installed and they use module manager, and module manager tells KSP to use its own tech tree file.

This is easy to fix though, just open your persistent.sfs, do a control+f search for techtree, and change "GameData/ModuleManager.TechTree" to "GameData/Squad/Resources/TechTree.cfg"

That'll fix it.

Hi, I post here to ask you how did you fixed that issue, i have a pretty similar issue with a rescue contracts, i landed next to the capsule but no kerbal.

I searched in my persisent.sfsn i found the contract but no trace of any Kerbal named Alddos Kerman (the one i have to save).

Can anyone help me to fix that issue ?
